mapper.select: SELECT a.subj AS kwamok, a.stateCD, b.mkey AS mKey,b.mFstName,b.mLstName, c.empKey AS fstEmpKey, c.empName AS fstEmpName, a.fstYoil, a.sndEmpKey AS sndEmpKey, d.empName AS sndEmpName, a.sndYoil, b.birthYMD, b.sexCD, b.schoolName, b.gradeCD, b.addr, b.tel, b.gPhone, b.ePhone,b.gFstName,b.gLstName,globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{mdi.jisa},'0009',a.IpheiPathCD,#{lang},'1') AS ipheiPath, b.mEmail, b.gEmail, b.specialComment, c.empName AS sName, c.depid1, c.depid2, a.jisaCD as jisa, a.setCnt, #{mdi.sKey} AS sKey FROM globalbiz.MemKwamokMst a INNER JOIN globalbiz.MemMst b ON a.mkey = b.mkey INNER JOIN globalbiz.ComEmpMst c ON a.fstEmpKey = c.empKey LEFT JOIN globalbiz.ComEmpMst d ON a.sndEmpKey = d.empKey WHERE a.mkey=#{mdi.mKey} AND a.subj=#{mdi.kwamok} AND a.jisaCD = #{mdi.jisa}
SELECT mstCD, dtlCD, jisaCD, dtlCDNME AS dtlCDNM FROM globalbiz.ComCodeDtl WHERE mstCD IN ('0003','0009') AND jisaCD = #{jisaCD} ORDER BY mstCD, sortVal1

SELECT a.subj AS kwamok, globalbiz.FuncCodeDtlNM(#{mdi.jisa},'0008',a.stateCD,#{lang},'1') AS state, ipheiYMD, bokheiYMD, huheiYMD, setCnt, CASE WHEN fstYoil='1' THEN 'SUN' WHEN fstYoil='2' THEN 'MON' WHEN fstYoil='3' THEN 'TUE' WHEN fstYoil='4' THEN 'WED' WHEN fstYoil='5' THEN 'THU' WHEN fstYoil='6' THEN 'FRI' WHEN fstYoil='7' THEN 'SAT' ELSE '' END AS fstYoil, b.empKey AS fstEmpKey, b.empName AS fstEmpName, CASE WHEN sndYoil='1' THEN 'SUN' WHEN sndYoil='2' THEN 'MON' WHEN sndYoil='3' THEN 'TUE' WHEN sndYoil='4' THEN 'WED' WHEN sndYoil='5' THEN 'THU' WHEN sndYoil='6' THEN 'FRI' WHEN sndYoil='7' THEN 'SAT' ELSE '' END AS sndYoil, c.empKey AS sndEmpKey, c.empName AS sndEmpName FROM globalbiz.MemKwamokMst a INNER JOIN globalbiz.ComEmpMst b ON a.fstEmpKey = b.empKey LEFT JOIN globalbiz.ComEmpMst c ON a.sndEmpKey = c.empKey WHERE mkey = #{mdi.mKey} ORDER BY state, ipheiYMD DESC
SELECT ipheiYMD AS firstIpheiDate FROM globalbiz.MemIpheiMst WHERE mkey=#{mKey} ORDER BY ipheiYMD LIMIT 0,1
CALL devglobaldig.SPOmrGichoList(#{hkey},#{kwamok},#{searchYY},#{jisa},#{lang})
CALL devglobaldig.SPMemberJindanCheck(#{mKey},#{kwamok},#{fstYoil})
SELECT JUNG_KEY AS jungKey, JUNG_DAB AS jungDab, JUNG_HANG AS jungHang FROM devglobaldig.JDNSys8070P WHERE jisa=#{jisa} AND kwamok =#{kwamok} AND LEFT(JUNG_KEY,1) = #{dung}
SELECT TOT FROM devglobaldig.JDNSys8 WHERE SBJ = #{kwamok} AND GRD = #{dung} AND JISA = #{jisa};
SELECT inSta FROM devglobaldig.OmrGicho WHERE hkey =#{mKey} AND kwamok = #{kwamok} AND omrDate = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d')

CALL devglobaldig.SPOmrGichoInsert(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),#{mdi.mKey},#{mdi.kwamok},'','',#{mdi.mFstName},#{mdi.mLstName},#{mdi.sKey},#{mdi.sName},#{dung}, #{mdi.gradeCD},'1',#{mdi.fstYoil},#{mdi.sndYoil},#{mdi.setCnt},#{mdi.birthYMD},CONCAT(#{ami.jisaCD},#{ami.depid1}),#{ami.jisaCD},'3',CONCAT(#{ami.jisaCD},#{ami.empKey}))
CALL devglobaldig.SPOmrOdabInsert(#{jisa},#{omrDate},#{hKey},#{kwamok},#{dung},#{munNo},#{odabNo})

CALL devglobaldig.SPOmrBan(#{ami.jisaCD},DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d'),#{mdi.mKey},#{mdi.kwamok},'0','0',#{dung}, #{mdi.gradeCD},'1',#{mdi.fstYoil},#{mdi.birthYMD},#{mdi.setCnt},#{mdi.setCnt},#{mdi.sndYoil},'20',CONCAT(#{ami.jisaCD},#{ami.empKey}))
SELECT FuncMemSubjNM(#{jisa},#{kwamok},#{lang},'1') AS KwamokName
SELECT mstCD, dtlCD, jisaCD, dtlCDNME AS dtlCDNM FROM globalbiz.ComCodeDtl WHERE jisaCD = #{jisa} AND mstCD IN ('0021','0201') ORDER BY mstCD, dtlCD, sortVal1

CALL globalbiz.SPHuheiInsert(#{huGubun}, #{huheiDay}, #{mdi.kwamok}, #{mdi.mKey}, #{mdi.sKey}, #{ami.depid1}, #{ami.depid2}, #{ami.jisaCD}, #{huSayu}, CONCAT(#{ami.jisaCD},#{ami.empKey}), CONCAT(#{ami.jisaCD},#{ami.depid1},#{ami.depid2}), #{ami.empKeyLvCD})
